name: prwire-mcp-server
description: MCP server for PRWire - the permissionless newswire for crypto and digital assets. Get latest news, search articles, and submit press releases across 4 crypto publications.

tools.name: get_latest_news
tools.description: Get the latest crypto news articles from the PRWire network (4 publications)

tools.name: search_news
tools.description: Search for crypto news articles across the PRWire network

tools.name: submit_press_release
tools.description: Submit a press release for distribution across the PRWire network
